snippet: The men, affiliated with Island Child Development Center in Far Rockaway, Queens, are accused of diverting $12.5 million in public funds.
abstract: Ira Kurman, Rabbi Samuel Hiller, Roy Hoffmann and Daniel Laniado, who are affiliated with Island Child Development Center in Far Rockaway, Queens, are accused of stealing $12.5 million in state and city funds; nonprofit group provides preschool special education services.
lead_paragraph: The men, affiliated with Island Child Development Center in Far Rockaway, Queens, are accused of diverting $12.5 million in public funds.

headline.main: Theft Charges for 4 With Ties to a Provider of Special Ed
headline.print_headline: Theft Charges for 4 With Ties to a Provider of Special Ed
